languages.text: "Разумеется, Лорд-капитан! Еще раз поздравляю, и да пребудет с вами свет предвечной Терры!"
"Of course, Lord Captain. Congratulations again, and may the light of the eternal Terra shine on you!"
languages.original_text: "Разумеется, Лорд-капитан! Еще раз поздравляю, и да пребудет с вами свет предвечной Терры!"

traits.locale_text: "Of course, Lord Captain. Congratulations again, and may the light of the eternal Terra shine on you!"
"Of course, Lord Captain. Congratulations again, and may the light of the eternal Terra shine on you!"
"Of course, Lord Captain. Congratulations again, and may the light of the eternal Terra shine on you!"
"Of course, Lord Captain. Congratulations again, and may the light of the eternal Terra shine on you!"
"Of course, Lord Captain. Congratulations again, and may the light of the eternal Terra shine on you!"

languages.text: « Bien entendu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je vous réitère mes félicitations, et puisse l'éclat éternel de Terra illuminer vos pas ! »
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain. Congratulations again, and may the light of the eternal Terra shine on you!"

traits.locale_text: « Bien entendu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je vous réitère mes félicitations, et puisse l'éclat éternel de Terra illuminer vos pas ! »

languages.text: "Natürlich, Lord Captain. Glückwunsch noch einmal, und möge das Licht des ewigen Terra auf Euch herabscheinen!"
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain. Congratulations again, and may the light of the eternal Terra shine on you!"

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, Lord Captain. Glückwunsch noch einmal, und möge das Licht des ewigen Terra auf Euch herabscheinen!"

languages.text: «Por supuesto, Lord Capitán. Reitero mi enhorabuena, y ¡que la luz de la eterna Terra {mf|lo|la} ilumine!».
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain. Congratulations again, and may the light of the eternal Terra shine on you!"

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto, Lord Capitán. Reitero mi enhorabuena, y ¡que la luz de la eterna Terra {mf|lo|la} ilumine!».

languages.text: “当然，舰长大人。再次祝贺您，愿永恒的泰拉之光照耀您！”
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain. Congratulations again, and may the light of the eternal Terra shine on you!"

traits.locale_text: “当然，舰长大人。再次祝贺您，愿永恒的泰拉之光照耀您！”

languages.text: 「もちろんです、ロード・キャプテン。改めて、おめでとうございます。永遠なる地球の光が陛下に輝きますように！」
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain. Congratulations again, and may the light of the eternal Terra shine on you!"

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんです、ロード・キャプテン。改めて、おめでとうございます。永遠なる地球の光が陛下に輝きますように！」

languages.text: "Elbette Lord Kaptan. Yeniden tebrik ederim. Ebedî Terra'nın ışığı üzerinizde olsun!"
languages.original_text: "Of course, Lord Captain. Congratulations again, and may the light of the eternal Terra shine on you!"
